original_text: And the Levites took down the ark of the Lord, and the coffer that was with it, wherein the jewels of gold were, and put them on the great stone: and the men of Bethshemesh offered burnt offerings and sacrificed sacrifices the same day unto the Lord.
korean_text: 레위인은 여호와의 궤와 그 궤와 함께 있는 금 보물 담긴 상자를 내려다가 큰 돌 위에 두매 그 날에 벧세메스 사람들이 여호와께 번제와 다른 제사를 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And the Levites took down the ark of the Lord,
and the coffer that was with it,
wherein the jewels of gold were,
and put them on the great stone:
and the men of Bethshemesh offered burnt offerings
the same day unto the Lord.
